{"id":572174308,"lang":"cpp","time":"11 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1634400724,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"27 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/572174308/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"16.4 MB","code":"/*\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\n--||author : codechaser||-- \n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\n*/\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        vector<int> mx = height, collect(height.size(),0);\n        for(int i = 1; i < height.size(); i++) mx[i] = max(mx[i-1],height[i]), collect[i] = mx[i] - height[i];\n        vector<int> mxR = height, collectR(height.size(),0);\n        for(int i = height.size()-2; i > -1; i--) mxR[i] = max(mxR[i+1],height[i]), collectR[i] = mxR[i] - height[i];\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < height.size(); i++) ans += min(collect[i],collectR[i]);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};\n/*\n    |---------------------------------------------------|\n    |||   https://codeforces.com/profile/codechaser   |||\n    |||   https://www.codechef.com/users/codechaser   |||\n    |||        https://github.com/code-chaser         |||\n    |---------------------------------------------------|\n*/","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
